name: Yo! box&boxes
description:
The Earth is attacked by happy cubic blob aliens coming from the borders of the space !
Help Yo to save the world ! Carry his package for delivery by avoiding the blobs enemies !
This game is a runner endless game, avoid blobs obstacles to progress in the game!

Features
◇ Use bonuses to rush, sprint & beat varied enemies
◇ Endless road game include random & procedural level generation
◇ A simple pure and innovative gameplay
◇ Easy to learn, but happy challenging ! Try & retry to go as far as possible !
◇ A rush action game with pure challenge ! very hard on high level !
◇ This game is recommended by the forklift truck operators !
◇ Unlock new fun characters & fenwick vehicles

How to play: One finger gameplay
◇ Tap to move the position of the yellow box
◇ Avoid red blobs & obstacles
